title: Network Hardening & IoT Lockdown in Ocala, FL
headline: Real protection for your home network, not just antivirus popups.
description: We secure your Ocala home network using professional-grade methods to protect against malware, ad tracking, and insecure IoT devices. No subscriptions. No spyware. Just control.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Smart speakers, TVs, and even light bulbs often report back to third parties, collecting data about your home and usage patterns. Many of them bypass basic router settings completely.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Install local DNS filtering (e.g., Pi-hole, AdGuard)
Harden your network's router and firewall rules
Isolate vulnerable smart home devices (IoT VLANs)
Eliminate cloud logins and manufacturer tracking
Apply open-source tools with no subscriptions

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We evaluate your current setup, then harden your internal network using open-source, local-first tooling. You stay in control, and we explain every step. No black boxes, no ongoing fees.
